channel.title: Eeh, just a change in code help

item.title: Eeh, just a change in code help
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

I want to get the slash to work server-sided for my clan chat i just made. The current command is ::cm and i need to get rid of that. This is the code for the slash, how could i get it to work as a command, yet send the message. Below is the / code in client, and the ::cm code for server.

if(aString887.startsWith("/")) //clanchat
{
aString887 = "::"+aString887+"";//+aString887+":clan";
if (command.startsWith("cm")) {
	if(clanLeader != "nobody" && clanName != "none") {
		sendClanMessage(command.substring(3));
	} else {
		sM("You need to be in a clan to send clan messages!");
	}
}

Read full topic
item.source: Eeh, just a change in code help
